attributes.action: prohibit persons from claiming to be "in contact" with spirit entities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The practise of "spiritual mediumship" is an area where the vulnerable are preyed upon by con artists who perport to be in contact with the dead.  It has been proved beyond reasonable doubt that this is merely showmanship and cheap trickery.  It is time HM Government protected the vulnerable by introducing a bill to prevent this shambolic trickery.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
